com.camerontec.catalys.server.adapter

Interface IPeerApplicationReader

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IComponent, IHasAttributes
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IPeerApplicationManager
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultFlatFileReader, DefaultJdbcApplicationReader, PeerApplicationManager, PeerApplicationManagerService

    public interface IPeerApplicationReader
extends IComponent
    Interface to be implemented by classes capable of reading objects from a peer application.

    Implementations must follow the IComponent model strictly.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface com.camerontec.catalys.server.component.IComponent

        ACTIVE_KEY, NAME_KEY, NOT_EFFECTED_BY_HIGH_AVAILABILITY, SERVICE_ALWAYS_ACTIVE

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isBlockingRead()
      Return whether the read mechanism being used is blocking or non-blocking.
      IPeerApplicationResultSet read()
      Read an object from the peer application.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.camerontec.catalys.server.component.IComponent

        closeComponent, getComponentStatus, isComponentActive, isComponentOpen, openComponent, setComponentActive

      • Methods inherited from interface com.camerontec.catalys.util.attributesupport.IHasAttributes

        addAttributeChangeListener, getAttribute, getAttributeNames, getAttributes, refreshStateFromAttributes, removeAttributeChangeListener, setAttribute, setAttributes

    • Method Detail

      • isBlockingRead

        boolean isBlockingRead()
        Return whether the read mechanism being used is blocking or non-blocking.
        Returns:
        True if the read mechanism is blocking, false if it is non-blocking.

      • read

        IPeerApplicationResultSet read()
                        throws PeerApplicationException
        Read an object from the peer application.

        This method must not return any objects previously marked as being sent or being in error via the IPeerApplicationResultSet.markAsSent() and IPeerApplicationResultSet.markAsError(java.lang.Object) methods respectively.

        Returns:
        A result set containing zero or more objects.
        Throws:
        UnsupportedOperationException - If not supported by implementation.
        PeerApplicationException - On error.
